item.title: Nintendo NX Handheld Console Coming This Year As Standalone Portable Gaming Machine: IHS
item.description:
Nintendo NX Handheld Console Coming This Year As Standalone Portable Gaming Machine: IHS

A statement from Hiroshi Hayase, an IHS senior principal analyst, hints at the possibility that Nintendo will release a new portable gaming device later this year. The handheld console should be one of the two next-gen gadgets that make up the highly-anticipated and rumored NX project.

item.title: Google to overtake Apple as world's biggest company | The Times
item.description:
Google to overtake Apple as world's biggest company | The Times

Google is poised to overtake Apple within days as the world's biggest business, it emerged last night, adding fuel to the row about how little tax it pays in Britain. The internet giant will report record profits of more than £11 billion today, which should provide the small uplift it needs in its share price to topple its rival.

item.title: The Division Beta PS4 vs PC vs Xbox One Graphics Comparison: Parity Between Consoles, PC Trumps All
item.description:
The Division Beta PS4 vs PC vs Xbox One Graphics Comparison: Parity Between Consoles, PC Trumps All

Take back New York City but on which platform? The reveal of Tom Clancy's The Division all those years ago at E3 2013 was interesting, to say the least. In the midst of so many survival-oriented games on consoles (it was the same year The Last of Us released on PS3), it immediately garnered interest for its MMO structure.

item.title: Apple's iPhone 7 Headphone Gamble Could Pay Off
item.description:
Apple's iPhone 7 Headphone Gamble Could Pay Off

Apple may well kill off the headphone socket, so here's how it can turn that into a massive victory

item.title: Google to overtake Apple as world's biggest company | The Times
item.description:
Google to overtake Apple as world's biggest company | The Times

Google is poised to overtake Apple within days as the world's biggest business, it emerged last night, adding fuel to the row about how little tax it pays in Britain. The internet giant will report record profits of more than £11 billion today, which should provide the small uplift it needs in its share price to topple its rival.

item.title: Everything We Know About the iPhone 7 So Far
item.description:
Everything We Know About the iPhone 7 So Far

Investing in a new iPhone, whether for practical purposes or just to stunt, is a difficult decision to make. Do you buy Apple's latest iPhone model or do you wait it out for an even better one to be released one week later (I'm exaggerating, of course)?

item.title: iPhone 7 Flop Is Apple Inc.'s Nightmare Scenario -- Here's Why It Might Happen
item.description:
iPhone 7 Flop Is Apple Inc.'s Nightmare Scenario -- Here's Why It Might Happen

With a $517 billion market capitalization, it's hard to see Apple Inc. as vulnerable. But the reality is that the world's most valuable publicly traded company, the one with $216 billion in cash on hand, is betting its next few years of growth and its vaunted brand cachet on a single product: the iPhone 7.

item.title: Two Final Fantasy Legends Now Working On A Mobile Strategy Game
item.description:
Two Final Fantasy Legends Now Working On A Mobile Strategy Game

Yoshitaka Amano is famous for his art. Nobuo Uematsu is famous for his Final Fantasy music. The two are back working together on a new game, only instead of it being a JRPG, it's an "an esports-driven mobile title". http://kotaku.com/5917619/the-be... Say the name "Yoshitaka Amano" to a longtime Final Fantasy fan and they may well go all...

item.title: VR headset showdown: HTC Vive vs Oculus Rift vs PlayStation VR
item.description:
VR headset showdown: HTC Vive vs Oculus Rift vs PlayStation VR

Virtual reality is undoubtedly one of the hot tech topics of the moment, with HTC (plus Valve), Oculus (owned by Facebook) and Sony all launching next-generation headsets at some point later this year. But what exactly are the differences between them?
